channel.title: Macos 26 Tahoe on 无关紧要的宇宙
channel.description: Recent content in Macos 26 Tahoe on 无关紧要的宇宙

item.title: What to expect (and not expect) from yet another September Apple event
item.description: An all-new iPhone variant, plus a long list of useful (if predictable) upgrades.

item.title: Parallels Desktop 26 offers a lot to enterprise users, a little to consumers
item.description: There are no major new consumer features. Enterprises get a few things though.

item.title: RIP to the Macintosh HD hard drive icon, 2000–2025
item.description: Latest macOS 26 Tahoe finally excises old spinning rust icons throughout the OS.

item.title: Six lesser-known features to like in the macOS 26 Tahoe public beta
item.description: Here are some things you can kick the tires on if you install the public beta.
